rounds more

version of the

cartridge.

locks with this.

about the size of

waited for me.»

It's gold-plated. It\nlooks like a large\nclock cog.
A tool to open the\nmanhole lid.
I can restore the\npower to the lab\nwith this.

for superconductor
fuses.
I can save Sherry\nwith this.
Used to create the\nvaccine. I need the\nbase vaccine first.
I can't tell what's\non the film until\nI develop it.
Vaccine cartridge\nprocessed with\nthe activator.

There must be an\nunopened locker\nsomewhere.

High power plug.\nUsed to activate\nlarge generators.

It's in the shape of\na spade.

A key to activate \nthe control panel .{clear 0}The letter «D» is\nengraved.
A key to activate \nthe control panel .{clear 0}The letter «U» is\nengraved.
It looks unique.\nNow I can access\nthe power room.
The label says\n«For Cargo Room\nVerification».
It looks like a\ncard key for lab\naccess.
It looks very\nimportant.
I have to hurry and\nget that train\noperational!
